Misc

-   Packages
    -   [{]{style='color: #990000'}[carelesswhisper](https://github.com/coolbutuseless/carelesswhisper){style='color: #990000'}[}]{style='color: #990000'} - Speech-to-Text; Automatic speech recognition in R using whisper.cpp; Translation; Can use huggingface and ggerganov models; no dependencies
-   Strong Baseline Model: ResNet/EffNet
